name: European Veterinarians in Education, Research and Industry
membership: EVERI is a section of FVE, the Federation of Veterinarians in Europe.The European Veterinary profession, embodied by FVE, strives to promote animal health, animal welfare and public health across Europe.
goal: EVERI's mission is to promote the health and well being of man and animals by creating a better understanding with the general public of the benefits of research, innovation and education in veterinary sciences.
interests: Agriculture and Rural Development, Consumer Affairs, Education, Fisheries and Aquaculture, Food Safety, Information Society, Public Health, Research and Technology
euInitiatives:
Revision of the Legislation governing veterinary medicinal products and medicated feed

Animal Health law

Training of Animal Welfare officers

Dir 2013/55 Veterinary training
